document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2001-05
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING A NEW ZONING CODE CHAPTER 19.32, THE MOBILE HOME PARK CONVERSION ORDINANCE, TO ESTABLISH PROCEDURES FOR THE CONVERSION OF ANY MOBILE HOME PARK IN THE CITY TO ANY OTHER USE, AND THE ACCEPTANCE OF A NEGATIVE DECLARATION
